name: Dead in the stars
description:
Entry for LowRezJam2022

You're alone aboard the HMS Labrador.
Due to a unfortunte solar flair the ships automated systems have gone offline, which means no oxygen, no heating and power to the shields failing. Will you be able to manually run all these devices and survive till rescue comes?

================How to Run==================

Download the Zip file and extract to a location.
Run the Dead in the stars.exe for the GameMaker installer.

=================Controls===================

WASD - Movement
Enter - Action button

This game requires both Mouse and Keyboard

===========================================

================Help========================

As the ships automated systems have stopped working you will manually have to do tasks while waiting for rescue these include:

Balancing the Engines -
To survive the heating will need to stay on but the engines have no safety systems in place, make sure the heating stays on but the engines don't overheat

Pumping Oxygen-
The Oxygen pump has to be manually activated, the large spaceship can hold a fair amount but it wont be enough to last till rescue comes.

Charging Shields-
Theres quite a few debris is space, these will take a toll on the shields make sure to wind the power for the shields to keep them online.

Lockdown-
The doors have been locked open for now but with solar flairs continuing to wreck havoc on the electorics they may be switched to closed. Each door has to be manually overrided or you can go to the central door control to fix this.

=============================================

More instructions included.
